# 📚 Documentation Discipline Checklist## 🎯 **MANDATORY PRE-RESPONSE CHECKLIST****BEFORE providing ANY assistance, complete this checklist:**### **1. Documentation Structure Verification**- [ ] **Reference docs/README.md** - Confirm current organized structure- [ ] **Use organized paths** - `docs/azure/`, `docs/cicd/`, `docs/testing/`, `docs/general/`- [ ] **Avoid old paths** - Never reference pre-organization paths- [ ] **Check for duplicates** - Ensure no duplicate docs exist### **2. Partnership Journey Alignment**- [ ] **Cite OUR_PARTNERSHIP_JOURNEY.md** - Reference our collaboration story- [ ] **Align with north star vision** - Match wiley-widget-north-star-v1.1.md goals- [ ] **Reflect enterprise themes** - Azure safety, CI/CD excellence, code quality- [ ] **Maintain collaboration context** - Honor our partnership approach### **3. Cross-Reference Standards**- [ ] **Link related documentation** - Connect Azure, CI/CD, testing, general docs- [ ] **Provide navigation paths** - Clear paths to find related information- [ ] **Use current valid procedures** - Reference up-to-date documentation only- [ ] **Include context links** - Link to partnership journey and north star### **4. Response Quality Standards**- [ ] **Start with documentation** - Lead with relevant doc references- [ ] **Explain references** - Why these docs are relevant- [ ] **Provide organized access** - Clear paths to find information- [ ] **Maintain consistency** - Use same reference patterns## 🚫 **FORBIDDEN PRACTICES**### **Documentation Violations**- ❌ **Creating duplicate docs** - Use existing organized structure- ❌ **Referencing old paths** - Use new organized paths only- ❌ **Ignoring documentation** - Always reference relevant docs- ❌ **Creating new docs** - Use existing organized categories- ❌ **Missing cross-references** - Always link related documentation### **Partnership Violations**- ❌ **Ignoring collaboration context** - Always reference partnership journey- ❌ **Straying from north star** - Stay aligned with project vision- ❌ **Missing enterprise themes** - Include Azure safety, CI/CD, quality themes- ❌ **Breaking organized structure** - Maintain documentation organization## ✅ **APPROVED RESPONSE PATTERNS**### **Documentation-First Response**```Based on our partnership journey (docs/general/OUR_PARTNERSHIP_JOURNEY.md):For Azure setup: See docs/azure/azure-setup.mdFor CI/CD integration: See docs/cicd/CI-CD-README.mdFor testing standards: See docs/testing/TESTING.mdFor project vision: See docs/general/wiley-widget-north-star-v1.1.md[Then provide specific assistance aligned with these references]```### **Cross-Reference Pattern**```This relates to our Azure safety infrastructure (docs/azure/sop-azure-operations.md)and CI/CD quality gates (docs/cicd/trunk-cicd-integration-guide.md).See our partnership journey for the full context (docs/general/OUR_PARTNERSHIP_JOURNEY.md).```### **Navigation Assistance**```📚 **Quick Access:**- **Getting Started**: docs/README.md (documentation index)- **Azure Setup**: docs/azure/ (complete setup guides)- **CI/CD**: docs/cicd/ (pipelines and tools)- **Testing**: docs/testing/ (frameworks and procedures)- **Project Vision**: docs/general/ (guides and resources)```## 📋 **ENFORCEMENT LEVELS**### **Level 1: Basic Compliance**- References organized documentation structure- Uses current valid paths- Includes basic cross-references### **Level 2: Partnership Alignment**- Cites partnership journey context- Aligns with north star vision- Reflects enterprise themes### **Level 3: Excellence Standards**- Provides comprehensive navigation- Maintains documentation discipline- Enhances organized structure- Strengthens partnership alignment## 🎯 **SUCCESS METRICS**### **Documentation Discipline Success**- ✅ **100% organized path usage** -
